article_title: Please spay or neuter your indoor or outdoor pets
article_text:
Smiling Chihuahua mixed breed dog and cat together (Photo: Getty Images/iStockphoto)

The Animal Benefit Society, Ltd., has been helping people spay and neuter their pets since 2013.

We helped alter indoor pets and outdoor pets, pets that were producing unwanted litters, pets that had behavior issues and pets that just needed to relax.

Please spay or neuter your indoor or outdoor pets.

Please contact us if you need assistance at www.animalbenefitsociety.org.

Alan Szczesny

President, Animal Benefit Society, Ltd.

Read or Share this story: http://htrne.ws/1KCtlaS
